name: Summer Dream Run (DEMO)
description:
Hello world, Today im releasing a demo version of Summer Dream Run, for ios and Android, The project is in Development stage, and not released for ios and android, but here is a little link if you wish to try it out on PC Or Mac :D

when trying the game, you must view in fullscreen to see the whole game screen, and the fullscreen button is the little square in your bottom right corner of the game.

To play the game you use: [SPACE] - Jump
[Left Mouse button] - Touch Start

when its playing on ios and android you just Tap the screen to jump, and likewise with Start button.
